original_text:
Age of the Gods Epic Troy
Come ben sa chiunque è avvezzo alle tematiche delle slot online, la storia antica con i suoi miti e leggende è una delle categorie che è stata più sfruttata in assoluto per creare titoli di questo tipo.
Tra i vari periodi storici più amati nel settore, sicuramente troviamo l’antica Grecia: grazie ai suoi numerosi dei e i poemi epici che traggono origine in questi tempi lontani, la penisola ellenica rimane tra le più gettonate per la tematica di una slot machine.
Ne è testimone Age of the Gods Epic Troy della Playtech, un titolo che eviteremo di ripetere nella nostra recensione a causa della sua lunghezza che trae origine dall’Iliade, ovvero la storia dell’assedio di Troia da parte dei grandi eroi greci come Achille e Ulisse.
In questo nostro approfondimento, cercheremo di sviscerare tutte le caratteristiche di questo titolo.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy – Storia a colori
Iniziamo parlando dell’aspetto grafico di questa slot, d’altronde anche l’occhio vuole la sua parte. Lo sfondo su cui è stata posizionata la griglia di gioco ricorda una città greca: mausolei e statue di marmo si ergono ai lati della griglia, con la luce che filtra e colpisce la schermata di gioco.
Al centro troviamo i simboli, i quali mostrano uno stile che ha voluto privilegiare il colore rispetto a uno stile classico di raffigurazione. Sebbene questo possa far storcere il naso ad alcuni classicisti, c’è da dire che la scelta di colori accesi e diversi tra di loro permette di non confondere i simboli, un rischio che non è così raro nelle slot di questo tipo.
Anche i suoni non si sposano particolarmente bene con la tematica, sfruttano jingle già usati in precedenza in slot dal taglio più moderno (mentre la musica mantiene uno stile piuttosto epico).
Vediamo cosa possiamo aspettarci da un punto di vista prettamente tecnico.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy
Ci troviamo di fronte a una slot di tipo 5*3 con quindici simboli mostrati a ogni giocata. Se questa introduzione potrebbe farci pensare a uno dei tanti titoli presenti online, è bene tenerci forte per essere pronti alle diverse novità apportate da questa slot.
Innanzitutto presenta 243 linee di vincita, promettendo non solo un grande numero di combinazioni, ma dal valore piuttosto elevato.
Inoltre sono presenti diverse modalità bonus: la prima è associata a Elena di Troia, la dama rapita che ha dato origine all’omonima guerra. Questo bonus apparirà quando otterremo abbastanza simboli di Elena nella schermata di gioco: ci verranno quindi assegnati tre giri gratuiti con i simboli di Elena bloccati in posizione. Ogni volta che ne troveremo uno nuovo, questo verrà bloccato insieme agli altri e riporterà il numero di giri disponibili a tre.
Ma questa, ovviamente, non è che la punta dell’iceberg che è questa slot.
Slot simili a Age of the Gods Epic Troy
Come abbiamo detto in precedenza, il tema greco non è propriamente nuovo nel mondo delle slot machine: ad esempio troviamo 300 Shields (a tema spartano), Apollo, Ares God of War e moltissime altre.

raw_translation.response:
Age of the Gods Epic Troy
As any experienced gambler knows, ancient myths and legends are one of the most exploited themes in the world of online slots. Among the most loved historical periods in the industry, we can certainly find ancient Greece: thanks to its numerous gods and epic poems originating from those distant times, the Hellenic peninsula remains one of the most sought-after themes for a slot machine.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy from Playtech bears witness to this, a title we will avoid repeating in our review due to its length deriving from the Iliad, the story of the siege of Troy by the great Greek heroes such as Achilles and Ulysses.
In this in-depth analysis, we will delve into all the features of this title.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy - A Colourful Story
Let's start by talking about the graphic aspect of this slot, after all, the eye also wants its share. The background on which the game grid is positioned resembles a Greek city: mausoleums and marble statues stand on either side of the grid, with the light filtering and hitting the game screen.
In the center, we find the symbols, which show a style that has chosen to privilege color over a classic depiction style. Although this may raise eyebrows among classicists, it should be said that the choice of bright and different colors allows the symbols not to be confused, a risk that is not so rare in slots of this kind.
Even the sounds don't particularly match the theme, using jingles already used in slot games with a more modern feel (while the music maintains an epic style).
Let's see what we can expect from a purely technical point of view.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy
We are faced with a 5*3 slot game with fifteen symbols shown on each spin. If this introduction might make us think of one of the many titles available online, it is best to brace ourselves to be ready for the different innovations brought by this slot game.
First of all, it has 243 paylines, promising not only a large number of combinations but also of rather high value.
In addition, there are several bonus modes: the first is associated with Helen of Troy, the abducted lady who sparked the eponymous war. This bonus will appear when we get enough Helen symbols on the game screen: we will then be awarded three free spins with the Helen symbols locked in place. Every time we find a new one, it will be locked together with the others and will reset the number of spins available to three.
But this, of course, is just the tip of the iceberg that is this slot game.
Similar slots to Age of the Gods Epic Troy
As we said earlier, the Greek theme is not new to the world of slot machines: for example, we find 300 Shields (with a Spartan theme), Apollo, Ares God of War, and many others.

response.headline: Gameplay and Features
response.content: Age of the Gods Epic Troy is a 5x3 slot machine with 243 paylines, providing plenty of opportunities for winning combinations. The game also has various bonus modes, including the Helen of Troy bonus, which is activated by obtaining enough Helen symbols on the game screen. With this bonus, players receive three free spins with Helen symbols locked in place, which reset to three every time a new symbol appears.

response.headline: Design and Graphics
response.content: Age of the Gods Epic Troy boasts a striking design, with a city in the background, statues, and mausoleums on either side of the grid, and bright, colorful symbols in the center. While some may criticize the game's choice of colors, this approach ensures that the symbols are easy to differentiate from one another and lessen the risk of confusion.

response.headline: Bonus Rounds
response.content: In addition to the Helen of Troy bonus mode, Age of the Gods Epic Troy offers several other bonus rounds. These include the Wall of Troy bonus, which triggers when players have three or more wall symbols on the reels, and they will then have to choose from several wall sections to reveal a prize. There's also the Trojan Horse bonus, where players will select from three horses to receive a cash prize or entry into the Free Games mode. Other bonuses include the Achilles and Hector free spins rounds, which offer players even more chances to win big.

response.headline: Theme and Setting
response.content: The game's theme is ancient Greece, specifically the epic story of the siege of Troy by Greek heroes like Achilles and Ulysses. Age of the Gods Epic Troy stays true to the legend, providing players with an immersive experience that takes them back in time to the Hellenic period. With a cityscape in the background and reimagined colorful symbols throughout the game, the setting will leave players feeling mesmerized and captivated.

response.headline: Player Experience
response.content: Overall, Age of the Gods Epic Troy is an exciting and immersive online slot that will appeal to any fans of the ancient Greek theme. The game's graphics and sounds inspire a thrilling and engaging experience, while the various bonus modes offer players opportunities to win big. The game also provides an above-average number of paylines, amplifying the chance of high-value combinations. Whether you are a casual player or a seasoned gambler, Age of the Gods Epic Troy is sure to provide a memorable gaming experience.

Review: Age of the Gods Epic Troy
As any experienced gambler knows, ancient myths and legends are one of the most exploited themes in the world of online slots. Among the most loved historical periods in the industry, we can certainly find ancient Greece: thanks to its numerous gods and epic poems originating from those distant times, the Hellenic peninsula remains one of the most sought-after themes for a slot machine.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy from Playtech bears witness to this, a title we will avoid repeating in our review due to its length deriving from the Iliad, the story of the siege of Troy by the great Greek heroes such as Achilles and Ulysses.
In this in-depth analysis, we will delve into all the features of this title.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy - A Colourful Story
Let's start by talking about the graphic aspect of this slot, after all, the eye also wants its share. The background on which the game grid is positioned resembles a Greek city: mausoleums and marble statues stand on either side of the grid, with the light filtering and hitting the game screen.
In the center, we find the symbols, which show a style that has chosen to privilege color over a classic depiction style. Although this may raise eyebrows among classicists, it should be said that the choice of bright and different colors allows the symbols not to be confused, a risk that is not so rare in slots of this kind.
Even the sounds don't particularly match the theme, using jingles already used in slot games with a more modern feel (while the music maintains an epic style).
Let's see what we can expect from a purely technical point of view.
Age of the Gods Epic Troy
We are faced with a 5*3 slot game with fifteen symbols shown on each spin. If this introduction might make us think of one of the many titles available online, it is best to brace ourselves to be ready for the different innovations brought by this slot game.
First of all, it has 243 paylines, promising not only a large number of combinations but also of rather high value.
In addition, there are several bonus modes: the first is associated with Helen of Troy, the abducted lady who sparked the eponymous war. This bonus will appear when we get enough Helen symbols on the game screen: we will then be awarded three free spins with the Helen symbols locked in place. Every time we find a new one, it will be locked together with the others and will reset the number of spins available to three.
But this, of course, is just the tip of the iceberg that is this slot game.
Similar slots to Age of the Gods Epic Troy
As we said earlier, the Greek theme is not new to the world of slot machines: for example, we find 300 Shields (with a Spartan theme), Apollo, Ares God of War, and many others.
